thread.title: Ground News - Qatari court’s commutation of death sentence of 8 Indians a major diplomatic victory
thread.title_full: Ground News - Qatari court’s commutation of death sentence of 8 Indians a major diplomatic victory

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Qatari court’s commutation of death sentence of 8 Indians a major diplomatic victory
text:
Summary by Ground News The commutation of death sentences awarded to eight former Indian Navy personnel to various sentences ranging from three to 25 years by the Qatari Court of Appeal is seen as a diplomatic victory by the Indian establishment. The death sentence was pronounced in October after the Navy personnel were detained in August 2022. The charges against them are not known, but reports hinted they have been held for espionage.
